class.name: EditorSyntaxHighlighter
class.brief_description: Base class for [SyntaxHighlighter] used by the [ScriptEditor].
class.description: Base class that all [SyntaxHighlighter]s used by the [ScriptEditor] extend from. Add a syntax highlighter to an individual script by calling [method ScriptEditorBase.add_syntax_highlighter]. To apply to all scripts on open, call [method ScriptEditor.register_syntax_highlighter].

method.name: _get_name
method.description: Virtual method which can be overridden to return the syntax highlighter name.

method.name: _get_supported_languages
method.description: Virtual method which can be overridden to return the supported language names.
